text: Marc David Maron (born September 27, 1963) is an American actor, comedian, and podcast host. He has been host of The Marc Maron Show and co-host of both Morning Sedition and Breakroom Live. From 2013 to 2016, he starred in his own show Maron. He also starred in a minor role in Joker (2019). Maron was born in Jersey City, New Jersey. He is Jewish. He grew up in New Jersey, Alaska and Albuquerque. He dated director Lynn Shelton until her death in May 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Alaska Category:Actors from New Mexico Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television presenters Category:Comedians from Alaska Category:Comedians from New Jersey Category:Actors from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American comedians Category:Television personalities from New Jersey
title: Marc Maron
